```{r}
# the goal is to concatenate these 3D arrays into one.
# All have the same dimensions
a <- array(1:24,  dim=c(3,4,2))
b <- array(25:48, dim=c(3,4,2))
c <- array(26:72, dim=c(3,4,2))

abc <- sapply(list(a,b,c), identity, simplify="array") # this is a 4D array
abc
dim(abc)    # [1] 3 4 2 3   4D array but we want 3D

# reshape the 4D array to 3D array
abc2 <- array(abc, dim=c(3,4,6))
abc2
```


```{r}
# reshape the 4D array to 3D array
abc2 <- array(abc, dim=c(3,4,6))
abc2
```
